content.rendered:
learn

Our Open Day

Only in Europe in Lyon

This day is a unique opportunity to clarify your professional project in the humanitarian sector: understanding the sector, choosing the right job, finding the right training course path. To get an overview of the course content with technical demonstrations of equipment used in the field. To exchange with trainers, students and graduates!

Is a school for becoming a humanitarian? Yes, there is!

Bioforce is the humanitarian school of reference. Every candidate, whatever his profile, will find a humanitarian training that suits him: bachelor’s degree, young graduate, employee undergoing retraining, experienced humanitarian…

Saturday, March 5, 2022: meeting in our center in Lyon

On the schedule:

  • Workshops on the application process, funding opportunities, housing;
  • Technical demonstrations of humanitarian equipment;
  • Students and graduates present to exchange with you and answer your questions!

Limited number of places per workshop

This event will only take place in person, it will not be possible to attend remotely. As the number of places is limited, registration to your workshop is mandatory (free) and will be checked upon your arrival in our premises.

There will be a workshop on our degree courses given in English on Saturday, March 5, 2022 from 10am to 12pm.

Register here to discover the Humanitarian Programme Manager and MSc in Humanitarian Programme Management courses

Practical information Lyon

41 avenue du 8 mai 1945 à Vénissieux
arrêt Darnaise Tram T4
